title.rendered: It’s not as simple as you think

content.rendered:
It’s not as simple as you think

Let’s make our public spaces disabled and elderly-friendly

Even a few steps on the way can be big obstacles for the disabled and elderly. We need to plan our public places and institutions with this in mind. As normal people, we tend to overlook these. This poster was to raise awareness about the difficulties faced by our fellow beings.
